reviews.text: The place was very welcoming, and the staff was very kind and gentle, swiftly directing us to our rooms. The rooms were comfortable and clean, and the TVS had many different streaming services we could choose from. Overall, a 10 out of 10 experience, highly recommend for people who want some private space just to chill.

The room was nice; the sofa was clean, the TV had a big screen, and the table is big enough. There were also tissues. It was easy to switch between different apps on the TV. Ultimately, it was a fun and enjoyable experience! Would come back again!

Was greeted with good service from the staff that made the process of getting to our designated room smoothly. Room was very comfortable and clean as the staff cleans it after every session. Room was sound proof as we wonâ€™t disturb by the room next door.
Love the big tv and sound system, which allowed us to enjoy the movies like we are in the cinema.
Downside was that the wifi connection was pretty bad due to the rain and the amount of people in the vicinity. But with the help of the staff, it was solved to a certain extent.

Anyways,
Will come back again! Great service & great place to chill and relax :)

it was really comfortable . the receptionist was very warm , welcoming and always smiled when talking to guests . it was a really enjoyable time , i watched endless movies and got to relax in such a well cleaned and smell room . will book again !!
The room was nice and clean, comfortable sofa and big TV screen.  Friendly staff as well. enjoyed my time here. Will come again, definitely recommend !
